text: nampikkai koṇṭu naṟceyalkaḷaic ceykiṟavarkaḷ (taṭukkappaṭṭa uṇavil) etaiyum (atu taṭai ceyyappaṭuvataṟku muṉṉar) pucittiruntāl (atu) avarkaḷiṉ mītu kuṟṟamākātu, (taṭukkappaṭṭapiṉ avaṟṟiliruntu) avarkaḷ vilaki, nampikkaiyiṉ mītē uṟutiyāka iruntu, naṟceyalkaḷaiyum ceytu, (maṟṟa pāvaṅkaḷiliruntum) vilaki, nampikkaiyai uṟutippaṭutti, (allāhvukkup) payantu, (piṟarukku) naṉmaiyum ceytu koṇṭiruntāl (pōtumāṉatu. Ākavē, taṭukkappaṭṭavaṟṟai muṉṉar pucittuviṭṭatu paṟṟik kuṟṟam piṭikkappaṭa māṭṭātu.) Allāh (ittakaiya) nallavarkaḷaiyē nēcikkiṟāṉ
